name: Company Officer
question: On a scale of 1-5, how much do you miss your family or pets?

options.value: Keep busy with all the Chase Hall activities here in ROM. That'll help.
You should go talk to your roomate, that may help.
I guess it's hard not to think about, but try the Wardroom. They're super friendly and will let you eat your sorrow.
Please go talk to the HS, they will have a way to help you.
